ItemDescription.Description: This item gives the owner additional Health every time they hit with a Basic Attack.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack restores 8 Health and 4 Mana. Basic Attacks that hit all enemies in melee range restore 4 Health and 2 Mana on every enemy after the first.

ShortDesc: Basic Attacks restore Health and Mana.
